body: Laws of electrodynamics, boundary value problems, relativistic effects, waves in dielectrics and ferrites, diffraction and equivalence theorems.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: E E 330)(Additional Attributes: NONE)

title: EE 430: Principles of Electromagnetic Fields
